title: Digital Comic Production and Transmedia-Based Maker Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and comprehension of storytelling
context.additional_context: Experiencing the convergence of literature and digital technology through creative expression activities using diverse media, providing collaborative learning environments with smartphone-based tools and online platforms.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of transmedia adaptation of literary texts into digital comics.
Learners can produce digital comics that construct meaning using multimodal elements (text, images, sound, etc.).
Learners can perform creative collaboration in physical and virtual spaces by integrating social media and digital tools.

resources: Digital comic creation software (e.g., Clip Studio Paint, Canva)
Online collaboration platforms (e.g., Notion, Google Workspace)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
